attributes.action: urgently facilitate the removal of Speaker Martins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as he is an absolute disgrace and totally incapable of performing his duties in what is supposed to be an august body.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
